entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
